2000 Convention Delegate Study

CDS2000.Rd

A subset of the 2000 Convention Delegate Study (CDS).

data(CDS2000)

Format

A 2892x14 matrix with the following columns:

Party

Party of convention delegate (1=Democrat, 2=Republican)

Preferred Presidential Nominee

1=Gore, 2=Bradley, 3=other democrat, 4=Bush, 5=McCain, 6=Forbes, 7=Keyes, 8=other republican

Race

1=white, 2=hispanic, 3=african-american/black, 4=american indian/native american, 5=asian, 6=other

Religious Tradition

1=evangelical protestant, 2=mainline protestant, 3=black protestant, 4=catholic, 5=eastern orthodox, 6=conservative nontraditional, 7=liberal nontraditional, 8=jewish, 9=other non-christian, 10=no affiliation, 99=missing

Lib-Con

Liberal-Conservative self-placement (1=liberal, 7=conservative, 99=missing)

Abortion

Views on abortion (1=no abortion ever, 2=abortion only when raped, 3=established reasons other than rape, 4=free choice, 99=missing)

Govt Services

Government provision of services (1=govt provide fewer services, 7=govt provide more services, 99 = missing)

Defense Spending

Defense spending scale (1=increase spending, 7=decrease spending, 99=missing)

Aid to Blacks

Programs that assist blacks (1=increase a lot, 2=increase slightly, 3=keep same, 4=decrease slightly, 5=decrease a lot, 99=missing)

Health Insurance

Government vs private insurance (1=government, 7=private, 99=missing)

Protect Homosexuals

Protection for homosexuals (1=special effort, 7=no special effort, 99=missing)

Affirmative Action

Surplus for Tax Cuts

Use any budget surplus for tax cuts (1=strongly agree, 5=strongly disagree, 99=missing)

Free Trade

Free trade even if it hurts US businesses (1=strongly agree, 5=strongly disagree, 99=missing)

Source

http://doi.org/10.3886/ICPSR31781.v1

References

Green, John C., Geoffrey C. Layman, Richard Herrera, and Thomas M. Carsey. Convention Delegate Study, 2000 [United States]. ICPSR31781-v1. Ann Arbor, MI: Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research [distributor], 2012-02-15. doi:10.3886/ICPSR31781.v1

Examples

data(CDS2000)

Contents

Developed by Dave Armstrong, Royce Carroll, Chris Hare, Ryan Bakker.
